website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight adjustable bed that offers convenient tools-free assembly.
pros: Equipped with anti-crushing motor technology to ensure safe use at all times
Equipped with high-end bicast leather and non-slip fabric
Delivers a smooth and seamless transition from position to position while generating no noise during the adjustment
cons: Some mattresses may move around on the bed
Heavy bed may require two or more people to assemble

customer_reviews.title: less than a year and broke
customer_reviews.text: I have had this less than a year and it is broke, now I am not hard on my things and the wealds on the movable rollers has broken I normally wait a wile after I have a product to write a review something like this I wait a year so that I can give more than my first impression at first glance it was great it worked and was not noisy seemed fairly solid but I guess I was wrong, I have sent seller a message and this review if they help I will raise the review other wise guess not
customer_reviews.author: William Herrell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality. Even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Even better than I expected. The edges surrounding the frame are beautiful and give it a finished look.The materials used are of a very high quality. It comes with a programmable wireless remote. Other beds offered in this price range have terrible remotes and stupid massage features that are only problems waiting to happen. The seller's customer service is exceptional. Highly recommend both the product and the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and quiet!  Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: These beds are amazing. We bought one just to see if it would work for us. It did! So we ordered another one. That’s when our troubles began because when we adjusted one, both responded. We tried to fix this but didn’t have any luck. Enter customer service! They were prompt in responding and very kind and helpful. With their help we managed to sync the controls and beds and now all’s well. The beds are very comfortable and quiet. Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Sally D

customer_reviews.title: Love the quiet motor
customer_reviews.text: So far so good... I've had one night on it. Easy set up, looks nice. Fits the Twin XL mattress perfectly. Best thing is the motor is very quiet. I was able to move the bed up and down without waking my husband. It weighed about 130 pounds, but one person did the assembly and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Katja Rowell M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and quiet. This bed has been great for my back, and for nights my reflux is acting up. Easy to assemble, but heavy enough I needed help from a friend to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Gusngladys

customer_reviews.title: Don't get me wrong the mattress is great, it's just an 8 inch one would have ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this bed for my sister, and she loves it. What she likes most is the bed is adjustable. The least is the 10 inch mattress I bought. Don't get me wrong the mattress is great, it's just an 8 inch one would have probably been better. She needs help getting in bed sometimes. I wish I could share photos, but I don't have the type of phone that takes pictures to be downloaded. So sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Vera Owens

customer_reviews.title: This frame is great for our memory foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: This frame is great for our memory foam mattress. Easy to adjust to a very comfortable position. The remote that cam with the bed did not work properly; but the company answered the phone right away and sent a replacement immediately. Would highly recommend this bed frame for those who are not interested in a massage function.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the previous one I had
customer_reviews.text: The product works really well it is silent and strong. Much better than the previous one I had .. I am 400 pounds and it handles the weight easily and efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Edfuhs

customer_reviews.title: Would absolutely recommend, purchase again
customer_reviews.text: It is as easy to assemble as stated. No tools required. Took less than 10 minutes. My only complaint is the legs are to short. For someone who has trouble getting up and down, a taller (average height) bed is important. But this is comfortable, quiet, and an outstanding value. LOVE the “zero G” setting.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Dowding

customer_reviews.title: WOnderful product
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! This is the next best thing to sliced bread. My husband has congestive heart failure and this bed has provided him with many positions to find a way to sleep. What a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. K

customer_reviews.title: Low price doesn't mean low quality - this one is very heavy duty and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Seems very heavy duty and well-made. The base is 100lbs, so don't expect something light weight. Super easy to put together with no issues or tools. Really love this unit and it works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: H. Templeman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and it works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and it works great. Remote has a user setup position for relaxing and another for watching TV and a button to go back to flat- very good bed.
customer_reviews.author: David D Grant

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I can't seem to find my perfect consistent sleep position but this allows me to tweak based upon my mood. It's amazingly quiet. I bought one for the spare bedroom as well and was shocked to find the next morning that it was in the exact same position as the one in my bedroom. Turns out they are all keyed as one, but instructions are included on how to rekey them if desired. It also has 2 USB ports on BOTH SIDES, so it doesn't matter which side is blocked.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha D.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Motors are very quiet and operate smoothly. We bought two twin XL frames so I had to reprogram the second remote so they would operate independently and it was very easy to do. The factory even reached out to me to make sure I was happy with my purchase and to make sure I didn't have any issues. For me, that's good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Toll

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably quiet operation
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, reasonably quiet operation, one drawback is placement of USB charger, middle of the frame, right where you lower the legs, get tangled in the cord a lot. A better placement would be toward top of the frame
customer_reviews.author: RHakaMS

customer_reviews.title: Excellant bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a very quiet and comfortable with only a thin mattress. I am a quadriplegic and it is by far the best sleep I have gotten in 9 years.
customer_reviews.author: mgra

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Easy to assemble like (5 minutes tops) very straight forward. The Hofish bed frame is also VERY VERY Quiet. Low noise for others or yourself when engaging up and down cycle. Easy controls to use, quiet, and sturdy frame. Also the charge plugs are handy on the frames. Thanks for a well designed product that delivers as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Hofish is a great product! Excellent unit
customer_reviews.text: Hofish is a great product! Excellent unit. Easy set-up. Operates as described, with no operation issues whatsoever. Well worth the money and I would advise this unit over any of the other higher priced competitors. I would definitely purchase this item again!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would need let alone enjoy an adjustable bed but take it from me, I have not had a good night sleep until my bed arrived. I put it in the zero gravity setting and I do t this k I move all night and wake up so refreshed. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Better sleep.
customer_reviews.text: My 92yr old father really is happy with this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene M Boule

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: We had a minor issue, but the customer service team came through for us. We love this bed.
customer_reviews.author: M McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product... Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Arrived during the time slot that was stated. Minimal assembly, but heavy. Very sturdy and very quiet. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As promised
customer_reviews.text: It was an easy assembly, installation. We've been using for few months now and the adjustments work as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Satyajit Malugu

customer_reviews.title: One minor issue
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good about this adjustable bed, except the padding on the sides. Although it looks nice, it kept it from fitting in a king size bedroom set when two were put together. The customer service was excellent. They sent me pictures and directions on how to take the USB ports out and remove the padding. It took about three hours to remove everything and make it look new, but by doing this to one of them....they now fit in the bedroom set nicely. The motor is quiet and the bed is comfortable. If not for the padding issue, I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed for aleviating pressure
customer_reviews.text: I am IN LOVE with my new bed!!! I suffered from multiple strokes, and have unable to reposition myself!! Therefor. I am very very prone to bedsores!! This bed has helped to aleviate the pressure points, witn the touch of a finger!!
customer_reviews.author: Aileen R.

customer_reviews.title: Super power bedframe
customer_reviews.text: This powered bed frame has worked very well. It is a little wider than other brands. It does not have vibration feature which is a plus for me. Price is very competitive. Assembly was very straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: James P Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! Very quiet motors work very well. Under bed lighting battery powered, less than expected less than hoped for but for the price ok. Set up was very easy! Sleeping better already. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel smith

customer_reviews.title: Best of all is the customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am totally spoiled by this bed. Sleeping deeper than ever before, no more backache from stuffing pillows so I can read in bed. Best of all is the customer service. I lost the remote in a move, it happens. I emailed Classic Brands about getting a replacement and they sent it immediately. Very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Starlight

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 3rd night !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my new house, it stayed in the box until my mattresses were delivered. I literally slept on it 3 nights and it broke!!!! I don’t know how to contact the seller but I would like a refund since I have to go buy another base now. The company should replace this or issue a refund
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: No support service if there is an issue.
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months bed stopped working for my special needs son, customer service is non existent as if they went out of business. Bed itself is not sturdy for someone over 200lbs. Company main product line is women’s underwear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hofish One-Step Assembly Customizable Positions Twin XL Solid Wood Slat Adjustable Bed Base with Backlit Wireless Remote&USB Ports Twin XL
feature_bullets: 【ONE STEP ASSEMBLY】 ●3 minutes tools-free assembly. ●No motor assembly required. ●With this thoughtful assembly design, HOFISH electric beds are easy to set-up for any adult

【FEATURES & PROGRAMS】 ●2 usb ports on each side of the adjustable beds(Four in total). ●Wireless back-lit remote control. 9 programs in total with 2 Customizable programs. ●Enjoy the amazing sleeping experience provided by HOFISH adjustable beds

【GERMAN TECHNOLOGY】 ●Comfortable noise-free experience when articulating HOFISH motorized adjustable beds. ●Smooth and seamless transition from position to position. ●Equipped with Anti Crushing Motor Technology, HOFISH electric adjustable beds are safer to use. ●Super powerful motor with a lifting capacity of 750 lbs (when weight is evenly distributed ), which makes HOFISH hospital bed enjoy the highest capacity in this class

【UNIQUE DESIGN & SUPERIOR MATERIAL】 ●High-end Bicast (PU) and non-slip high-quality fabric for the electric bed base. ●Natural built-in solid wood eucalyptus slat in HOFISH adjustable beds. ●Handy removable pocket for placing remote of HOFISH adjustable. ●Lightening Protection Adaptor increase the safety of HOFISH adjustable beds. ●“Flat button” in case of power outrage. ●2 height adjustable bed legs

【MORE THAN 500 UNREMITTING DAYS R & D】 ●NOTE: TWO TWIN XL WILL NOT FIT INTO A KING BED FRAME. It is one inch wider than standard king bed frame. ●7*24 hours professional after sales support team is at your service. ●All HOFISH adjustable beds have gone through double testing before shipping, which ensures what you received is an qualified motorized adjustable bed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars50 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
